description:
*This DLC is also included in "Additional Card Pass Vol.2" which is on sale. It is possible to purchase both individual "Additional Card Sets" and "Additional Card Pass Vol.2", but the acquisition of included contents will only be reflected once.

Cards from Booster Pack “ [D-BT09]: Dragontree Invasion” and some other PR cards will be unlocked. Additional cards can be obtained by buying pack “[D-BT09]: Dragontree Invasion” via in-game shop or by crafting. 
*Those PR cards are also included in this pack. 

[INCLUDED PR CARDS]
D-PR/224EN	Fairy of Candor, Darian
D-PR/238EN	Chakrabarthi Dance, "Saien"
D-PR/240EN	Friendship Fairy
D-PR/242EN	Refresh Time, Portia
D-PR/250EN	Steam Performer, Tougue
D-PR/252EN	Knight of Deity Decree, Thasus
D-PR/254EN	Flow Strike Brave Shooter
D-PR/235EN	Ala Dargente
D-PR/231EN	Versatile Assembler

For more details on upcoming cards, please check the latest list for " [D-BT09]: Dragontree Invasion" on the Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days official website.
name: Additional Card Set Vol.6 [D-BT09]: Dragontree Invasion
